title: Ref-Guide: Add Digital Signal Processing documentation
description:
This ticket will add a new section of documentation in the Math Expressions docs covering the Digital Signal Processing functions. The main areas of documentation coverage will include:

	Dot product
	Convolution
	Cross-correlation
	Find Delay
	Auto-correlation
	Fast Fourier Transform
